content: Hello Potion Seller, I am going into battle and I want your strongest potions.

success.story: Knight was able to breathe fire and complete his quest
Knight was able to breathe fire and complete his quest
Knight was able to breathe fire and complete his quest

failure.story: Knight was able to breathe fire and did not complete his quest
Knight was able to breathe fire and did not complete his quest
Knight was able to breathe fire and did not complete his quest

success: A shimmering scale from the mighty dragon. Adds resilience to potions.
A feather imbued with the essence of rebirth and renewal.
A mystical eye known for its transformative properties.
A rare herb used to enhance potion potency, but handle with caution.
Glimmering powder that adds a touch of enchantment to potions.
A majestic horn with purifying properties. Highly sought after.
A shimmering scale from the mystical mermaid. Adds fluidity to potions.
Unpleasant but potent. Used in certain dark potions.
A venom so potent it can be deadly. Use with extreme caution.
